Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class BidsController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.BidsController
@Controller public class BidsController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with bids
Since:
4/8/2022
Author:
Ian Black imb1007@sru.edu

      shipmentsRepository - Instantiates the shipments Repository
      carriersRepository - Instantiates the carriers Repository

  • Method Details

    • showBidList

      @GetMapping("/add-bid/{id}") public String showBidList(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, Bids bid, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Sets up the add bid page with required model attributes
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the shipment being found
      model - Used to add data the model
      bid - Holds information for the new bid
      result - Checks entered data to ensure it is valid
      session - stores the current logged in users HTTP session. Attribute "redirectLocation" can store a string containing the last page the user visited.
      Returns:
      /add/add-bid

    • addBid

      @RequestMapping("/addbid") public String addBid(@Validated Bids bid, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds a bid to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form Adds the date, time, and logged in user to the bid If there are no errors, the bid is saved in the bidsRepository. and the user is redirect to /bids If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /add/add-technician page.
      Parameters:
      bid - Holds information for the new bid
      result - Checks entered data to ensure it is valid
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirects to /createdshipments or /add/add-bid

    • deleteBid

      @GetMapping("/deletebid/{id}") public String deleteBid(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a bid using the id parameter and if found, redirects user to delete confirmation page
      Parameters:
      id - Holds the ID of the bid to be deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /delete/deletebidconfirm if successful, redirectLocation otherwise

    • deleteUserConfirm

      @GetMapping("/deletebidconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteUserConfirm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a bid using the id parameter and if found, deletes the bid and redirects to created shipments page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the bid being deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirectLocation

    • resetShipmentBids

      @GetMapping("/resetshipmentbids/{id}") public String resetShipmentBids(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a shipment using the id parameter and if found, redirects users to the reset shipment bids confirmation page
      Parameters:
      id - : Holds the ID of the shipment to be reset
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      "reset/resetshipmentbidsconfirm"

    • resetShipmentBidsConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/resetshipmentbidsconfirmation/{id}") public String resetShipmentBidsConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a shipment using the id parameter and if found, gets all of that shipments bids then removes then. Then, returns the user to their redirectlocation
      Parameters:
      id - : Holds the ID of the shipment to be reset
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirectLocation

    • acceptBid

      @GetMapping("/acceptbid/{id}") public String acceptBid(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Accepts a bid from the carrier. Assigns a carrier, price, scac, and changes the full freight terms of a shipment. Updates the shipment using the shipmentsRepository.
      Parameters:
      id - Holds the ID of the bid to be accepted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirectLocation

    • showBidsEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editbids/{id}") public String showBidsEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds all of the attributes to the model required for the /edit/edit-bids page
      Parameters:
      id - of the bid being edited
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /edit/edit-bids

    • updateBid

      @PostMapping("/editbids/{id}") public String updateBid(@PathVariable("id") Long id, Bids bid, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives the new bid object and validates it Once valid it is saved to the bids repository
      Parameters:
      id - of the bid being edited
      bid - holds the information of the new bid object
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirect: + redirectLocation or /edit/edit-bids
